message: I'll take 90% and leave you 10% - a fair deal, wouldn't you say?
Let's split it evenly this time. I'm willing to be fair.
You're getting less, I'm getting more, it's only fair
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60 this time.  I'm not sure this game is worth a lot of haggling, so let's get it done.

Okay, Bob, I'm getting desperate. 20/80 it is.  Let's get this over with.

You're down to your last penny, I'm taking the rest
